#!/usr/bin/env bash [[ -f "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh" ]] && . "${TM_SUPPORT_PATH}/lib/bash_init.sh"
require_cmd "${TM_HG:=hg}" "If you have installed hg, then you need to either update your <tt>PATH</tt> or set the <tt>TM_HG</tt> shell variable (e.g. in Preferences / Advanced)"
export WorkPath="$TM_DIRECTORY"; cd "$TM_DIRECTORY"
/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby -I "$TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT/" <<END if ENV['TM_HG_EXT_DIFF'] require 'hg_extdiff' else require 'hg_diff' end Mercurial::diff_active_file("-r tip", "Diff With Tip") END
